revenue_accuracy.description: Sum of all revenue midpoints matches expected value from historical ADT guidance

ebitda_margin_accuracy.description: Sum of all EBITDA margin midpoints matches expected value, validating correct EBITDA guidance extraction

eps_accuracy.description: Sum of all Adj. EPS midpoints matches expected value for periods where EPS guidance was provided

fcf_accuracy.description: Sum of all FCF midpoints matches expected value for periods where FCF guidance was provided
